question: Recently, Which bank launched new products like pre-approved credit card and UPI solution to mark its 124th foundation day?
explanation: Punjab National Bank (PNB) launched new products like pre-approved credit card and UPI solution to mark its 124th foundation day. PNB also announced its UPI partnership with WALNUT, an expense management app, that has features like bill reminders, bill-split and instant paperless loans. PNB conducted blood donation camps in 200 blood donation centres in 76 circle offices covering more than 6,500 branches in all states and union territories. The camp was inaugurated at PNB head office in New Delhi by Sunil Mehta, MD and CEO of PNB.
